/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Trees and bushes are scattered along the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
